title: 1.4 Master Challenge 2
question:
A software engineer works for 14 hours, 35 mins, and 20 seconds in one shift in a software company. Convert the total shift time into seconds and display that information.
NOTE: You must use at least ONE compound operator (+=, -=, *=, /=, %=) to complete this program.

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
